entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 21 March 2023
